Игра хайп, комюнити взрослые люди рекомендую

People are selected,
Who
have never seen or heard of Each other in their lives,
They don't know each other's names,
But they must live together for 40 minutes of the game,
Make friends and rally the team,
Win.
CS is more than a game!
